title: Pakistan can meet Romanian Human Resource needs: Sajid Turi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 15 (APP): Federal Minister for Overseas Pakistanis and Human Resource Development Sajid Hussain Turi on Tuesday said that Pakistan had great potential to meet the human resource of Romania in all professional sectors.
He expressed the remarks while meeting with Minister for Labour and Social Solidarity of Romania Marius-Constantin Budai in Bucharest.
He said that Pakistan had a great diaspora in Gulf States and Western European countries which played an instrumental role in the development and economies of their countries.
Both the dignities discussed bilateral relations and reiterated to enhance cooperation in various fields and agreed to work for the early signing of the MoU on the Labour Mobility Partnership.
Turi congratulated the Romanian nation in advance on the occasion of the Romanian National Day which would be celebrated on December 1.
Federal Minister for Overseas Pakistanis is on ten-day official visit to Switzerland, Romania, Greece and Portugal to explore employment for Pakistanis abroad.
